descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 1.0. Improved normal maps. All files in one archive - landscape, furniture, doors, Thirsk; only HD-version.

Almost full replacement of textures for a landscape Solstheim. Except those textures which are used from original game, certainly. I tried to make them similar on original, but lighter, colourful and cheerful. Textures and normal maps have resolution 2048?2048 (in original 256x256 or 512x512; in HRTP 1024x1024 or 512x512). No any upscales! 

Bonus #1: HD-retexture of furniture. 
Bonus #2: HD-retexture of beams, wooden details and woodcarving in Thirsk. Any boards are also included, but they aren\'t used in this location, apparently. 
Bonus #3: Doors in Raven Rock.

Installation: to unpack archive; to place the textures folder in the game Data folder. 

[youtube]lCu_ptxpi2o[/youtube]
author: langley
